page.title: 02The Main Street of Tavistock
page.content:
Tavistock has a variety of{shops.}It includes some greengrocers and several food markets and corner shops.The town has a good selection of bakeries and newsagents. Tavistock's newest establishment is called Computer Mania. The town has a variety of clothes shops also several building societies and banks.Tavistock has a good hardware store and decorating shop.We have a good choice of fast food shops open until late.We have several Inns. We have three pet shops.There are some unusual shops like "The Keep" which sells guns and fishing tackle.
Tavistock has two local {newspapers,}The Tavistock Times and The Gazette.The Main Street also has an Old Folks rest room.
